name: Legend of Himari 2 ~Heroes of Zaria~
detailed_description:
Heroic Adventure

Begin the game as novice heroes that want to become famous and help ordinary people.

Unusual gameplay

The game is an unique mix of a simulator, RPG, action and clicker. Find and improve new heroes and get coins to buy new items.

Battles

The battle happens in automatic mode: you have to monitor the health of your characters, cast their spells, use items and change the character placement, as the first hero takes most of the damage.

Heroes

Every hero, in addition to three stats (strength, dexterity, endurance), can have a special perk and a spell. Use them wisely during the battle, so as not to lose heroes and win faster!

Your party

Gather your team of heroes, come up with unique tactics for battles. Traditional Tank, Healer and Warriors? Or would only you use brute force?

Dungeons

When you’re ready, send your heroes on the most dangerous adventure — clearing dungeons. A series of battles with a boss fight at the end await you, but the reward will be worth it.

Events

Many randomly generated events will not make you bored! By gaining experience and getting more fame you will receive new, more challenging missions.
